name: The Maze (itch) (LegenDerry9)
description:
You are a lone wolf and you have found yourself in a maze. How did you get here? No time to think about that. Your priority right now is to find the key and escape the maze. Can you find the way out?

The Maze is a short puzzle game created for the Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #1 on itch.io.

Follow me on Twitter for future games! - https://twitter.com/LegenDerry9

Use WASD to move

Use the Mouse to look around

Hold Shift to run

Use E to interact with objects

Use the Spacebar to jump
